content: I love this listing of pitfalls and setbacks. I’ve seen or experienced every single one of these. I also love to see when a successful entrepreneur admits that mistakes and failures are part of the territory. Too often, media and marketers suggest that entrepreneurship is easy. They depict only the fruits of success. In reality, success requires much more than just “hard work” or “believing in yourself.” It requires mistakes. And, it requires the ability to do be productive with those mistakes.
